apothecary.bag_desc: A crisp brown paper bag with '{player}' written on the side in neat calligraphy.
apothecary.bagging_emote: {npc} bustles behind the counter, rustling open a paper bag. They carefully slide the {item} inside, fold the top down with a sharp crease, and set {bag} on the counter.

blacksmith.bag_desc: A rough burlap sack labeled '{player}' with a piece of charcoal. It smells of soot.
blacksmith.bagging_emote: {npc} grunts, grabbing a heavy burlap sack from a hook. They drop the {item} inside with a heavy clunk, tie it shut with rough twine, and drop {bag} onto the counter.

baker.bag_desc: A simple cardboard pastry box tied with string. It is addressed to '{player}'.
baker.bagging_emote: {npc} hums a tune, unfolding a small cardboard box. They place the {item} gently inside, dusting off excess flour, and tie the box shut before sliding {bag} across the counter.
